name: Apache HTTP Server basic deployment on a single virtual machine - IBM
description: This template deploys Apache HTTP Server with a basic configuration on a Linux virtual machine.

metadata.longDescription: This template deploys Apache HTTP Server with a basic configuration on a Linux virtual machine.

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes

1. The user is responsible for obtaining the appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
2. Detailed system requirements for Apache HTTP Server - http://httpd.apache.org/
